name: SplitGolf
description:
A puzzle golf game where you must get one ball into multiple holes by splitting it up

Made in 4h for Trijam 197 

CONTROLS

 * CLICK stuff to rotate it

 * SPACE to putt the ball, or restart the level

CREDITS

 * Nav n Zak - programming! wow

 * Hannah - art

 * Calloom - incredible level design

 * Luke - tasteful music choice

Music + sound effects from envato elements

Background jazz: Airport Lounge by Kevin MacLeod | https://incompetech.com/
Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
